-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
                                 Release Notes
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
The official soundtrack to the movie "Kevin & Perry Go Large". The first CD is
the music from the movie, while the second CD is a mix CD with music in the
same style as the movie. The names of all of the tracks came from the booklet
included with the soundtrack; some of the names are longer and more accurate
this way. Also, as this is rare now, I have also included scans of about
everything you could want from this album (see "Album Art" above). Enjoy!
